results.description: Jadon Sancho scores one and assists another goal as Borussia Dortmund come from behind to beat newly-promoted Cologne.
results.shortTitle: Sancho stars as Dortmund win again
results.title: Jadon Sancho stars as Borussia Dortmund make it two wins out of two

results.description: Tunisia's Ellyes Skhiri signs for German side Cologne on a four-year deal from French club Montpellier.
results.title: Tunisia's Ellyes Skhiri leaves Montpellier for Cologne

results.description: Live coverage of Saturday's German Bundesliga game between 1. FC Köln and Bayern Munich.
results.title: FC Köln v Bayern Munich

results.description: Arsenal reach the knockout stage of the Europa League as Group H winners despite losing at Cologne.
results.title: FC Cologne 1-0 Arsenal

thumbnail.altText: Arsenal's players react after falling behind to Cologne in the Europa League

results.description: Live text commentary from the Europa League as Everton are hammered by Atalanta after Arsenal are beaten by Cologne.
results.title: Europa League: Everton thrashed, Arsenal beaten - as it happened

results.description: Watch how the Cologne story developed on social media - 2,900 fans were expected for their opening Europa League match at Arsenal, but 20,000 made it to London.
results.title: Cologne fans' journey - how Arsenal trip unfolded on social media

results.description: Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger says it was "a gamble" to play Thursday's Europa League game after thousands of ticketless Cologne fans arrived at Emirates Stadium.
results.title: Arsenal 3-1 Cologne: Arsene Wenger surprised game went ahead

results.description: Police make five arrests as Arsenal's match against Cologne is delayed by an hour "in the interests of crowd safety" after thousands of ticketless away fans turn up.
results.shortTitle: Crowd trouble as Arsenal match delayed
results.title: Europa League: Arsenal v Cologne delayed by an hour at Emirates Stadium

results.description: Arsenal come from a goal down to beat Cologne in a match delayed for an hour by crowd problems.
results.title: Arsenal 3-1 Cologne: Gunners fight back to win

results.description: Bayern Munich move seven points clear at the top of the Bundesliga with a comfortable victory at Cologne.
results.title: Cologne 0-3 Bayern Munich
